cdlblk.title: WING-TO-BODY FILLET FAIRING (ADJACENT TO THE FIXED WING TRAILING EDGE UPPER PANEL)

numlitem.para: One or both may be missing. For each missing fairing the performance limited weights are reduced by:
Removal of the wing-to-body fillet fairing exposes a longeron splice fitting on the side of the body. This longeron splice fitting must be thoroughly speed taped.
The maximum operating speed is 270 KCAS (M = 0.73).
Mach-airspeed aural warning, VMO pointer, and MMO indicator must be reset in the main equipment center.
The Gear Down Dispatch placard must be adhered to when dispatching with the Wing-to-Body Fillet Fairing missing.
